name: All Beings Ecoscapes LLC
address: Denver, CO (Specific address not publicly listed, services are consultation-based)
description: Provides ecological landscape design services with a focus on Colorado native plants and permaculture design principles. They help clients convert lawns to native plant ecoscapes, pollinator gardens, and edible landscapes

name: Upper Colorado Environmental Plant Center
address: Meeker, CO (Specific address not publicly listed, operates as a non-profit)
description: A non-profit organization specializing in native plant propagation, seed increase, and ecological restoration services for federal land management agencies

name: Restorative Landscape Design (RLD)
address: Denver, CO (Specific address not publicly listed, operates in the Front Range)
description: Offers native plant landscaping and permaculture design in the Front Range of Colorado, focusing on pollinator-friendly xeriscapes, native prairie gardens, and low-water lawns. They are a woman-owned business

name: Habitat Guild
address: Fort Collins, CO (Specific address not publicly listed)
description: A full-service, design-build landscape company specializing in regenerative landscapes through an ecological lens, using native plants

name: Native Edge Landscapes
address: Boulder, CO (Specific address not publicly listed)
description: Offers landscape design, installation, and property care with a focus on sustainable practices and Colorado's unique outdoor environment

name: Colorado Native Landscapes & Design, LLC
address: Arvada, CO (Specific address not publicly listed)
description: Designs and builds landscapes that highlight the natural beauty of Colorado, focusing on custom landscape design plans that are natural to Colorado and add everyday function

name: Western Native Seed
description: Specializes in seeds of plants native to the Rocky Mountains, western Great Plains, and adjacent areas, providing high-quality seed for native plant enthusiasts and promoting the use of native plants for gardening, landscaping, and revegetation

name: The Colorado Native Seed Company (part of Cool Boulder)
address: Boulder, CO (Specific address not publicly listed)
description: Grows and sells native grass and flower seeds that are ecotypic to the Metro Denver/North Front Range area of Colorado, designed to thrive with minimal human help

name: MASA Seed Foundation Seed Store
address: Boulder, CO (Specific address not publicly listed)
description: Focuses on open-pollinated, heirloom, and regionally adapted seeds for local food security and regenerative farming, building a bioregional seed bank

name: Indigenous Collaboration, Inc.
address: Denver, CO (Specific address not publicly listed)
description: A Native American owned and woman-owned business dedicated to the empowerment and rejuvenation of Indian Country, offering processes and methodologies for productive conversations and problem-solving. While not directly a seeding business, they are an Indigenous-owned business in Colorado
